column1: @Pandora659 Yeah, pretty much dead center. We painted the target area with radio reflective paint, which helps the radar be more precise.
It's starting to feel kinda normal to reuse rockets. Good. That's how it is for cars & airplanes and how it should be for rockets.
RT @NASA: #ICYMI, more than 6,000 pounds of science & supplies left planet Earth at 5:07pm ET to head to @Space_Station: https://t.co/BPi0N…
